Rules of CSUN Map Trivia Game\n

In this game you'll be presented with a set of descriptive questions about CSUN's campus. 
The goal is to answer all the questions as fast as possible. 
After clicking the "Play" button, you'll be presented with a map of CSUN and a question below it. Scroll the map until you find the building you think answers the question best. Long press the building on the map. If your answer is correct, you'll see a green boarder surround the building you chose. If your answer is wrong, the game will show you the correct answer. 
After submitting your answer, an informative trivia about CSUN will appear where the question was and when you're ready for the next question, swipe the screen to the left. 
One thing though. If by any reason, the game is sent to the background you'll loose your points and will have to start a new game. Sorry, but we want to avoid cheating. 

Think YOU got what it takes to master CSUN Map Trivia?
